scripts.build: mkdir -p data/build/js && cp node_modules/autosize/dist/autosize.min.js data/build/js/ && rollup -o data/build/js/bundle.js -f iife -m inline src/js/index.js
scripts.develop: node src/server.js --dev & rollup -w -o data/build/js/bundle.js -f iife -m inline src/js/index.js
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run sync && node src/server.js --production
